Population: people with gagging during dental treatment
Outcome: Primary outcome: completion of dental procedure
Reasons for GRADE if not High:
Risk of bias is unclear and unpublished data for primary outcome was used. Hence downgraded by two levels for primary outcome and one level for secondary outcome.
Single study and done only in adults. Hence downgraded by one level for indirectness.
Wide CI and small sample size. Hence downgraded by one level for imprecision.

Population: people with gagging during dental treatment
Outcome: Secondary outcome: reduction in gagging: assessor-reported outcome - treatment effectiveness during stage 1

Risk of bias is unclear and unpublished data for primary outcome was used. Hence downgraded by two levels for primary outcome and one level for secondary outcome.
Single study and done only in adults. Hence downgraded by one level for indirectness.
Wide CI and small sample size. Hence downgraded by one level for imprecision.
